it.lucichkevin.cip.location

Class MyFakeLocationSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.lucichkevin.cip.location.MockLocationProvider.LocationListener
      • it.lucichkevin.cip.location.MyFakeLocationSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource

    public class MyFakeLocationSource
extends MockLocationProvider.LocationListener
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.LocationSource
    Used this class for create a mock locations for your position in Google Map, add this to a MockLocationProvider for create a dynamic location :)
    Author:
    Kevin Lucich (16/10/2014)
    See Also:
    MockLocationProvider, LocationSource, Location

      • addToMockLocationProvider

        public void addToMockLocationProvider(MockLocationProvider mockLocationProvider)
        Add this listener to the mockLocationProvider in parameters, it is a simply alias when you want create a new MockLocationProvider for test the MyLocation (blue dot) in GoogleMap.
        Parameters:
        mockLocationProvider - A MockLocationProvider to whom add the listener
